sentences.en: " A message to every land where the Jewish race is scattered "
sentences.cn: “ 禀告每一处犹太民族散居之地 ”

sentences.en: Christian holy week overlaps with the beginning of the Jewish holiday of Passover.
sentences.cn: 基督教的圣周与犹太教逾越节的头几天重叠。

sentences.en: He had been circumcised within eight days of birth as required by Jewish law.
sentences.cn: 根据犹太法律的规定，他在出生后8天内接受了割礼。

sentences.en: One of the most atmospheric corners of Prague is the old Jewish ghetto.
sentences.cn: 古老的犹太人社区是布拉格最具特色的角落之一。

sentences.en: Slowly Jewish communities were reconstituted and Jewish life began anew.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，犹太社区得到重建，犹太人的生活重新开始。

sentences.en: The coin bears a Jewish symbol.
The Jewish feast of Passover began last night.
sentences.cn: 犹太人的宗教节日逾越节昨晚开始了。

sentences.en: The local Jewish community was trying to help the family members.
sentences.cn: 当地的犹太人社区正努力救助这些遇难者的亲属。

sentences.en: The matchmaker has been an important member of Jewish communities for centuries.
sentences.cn: 数世纪以来，媒人一直在犹太人社区扮演着重要角色。

sentences.en: The only reason we leafleted on the Jewish New Year was because more people than usual go to the synagogue on that day.
sentences.cn: 我们在犹太新年派传单，纯粹是因为那天去犹太教堂的人比平日多。

sentences.en: They were two Jewish kids; I was friendly with both of them.
sentences.cn: 他们是两个犹太小孩; 我同他们都很要好.

sentences.en: Those advisers who aren't Jewish are of British descent.
sentences.cn: 那几个顾问除了犹太人,就是有英国血统的.

sentences.en: You're a real , genuine old Jewish type that digs the emotions.
sentences.cn: 你是个正宗的,爱讲感情的旧派犹太人.

trans.tran_cn: 犹太人的，犹太教徒的，犹太人作风的
trans.tran_en: Jewish means belonging or relating to the religion of Judaism, or to Jews as an ethnic group
